name: FPS Movement Demo
description:
This is just a little test. I have made a rigidbody character controller which is unconstrained in the air.

Since this is a test controls are not listed in game, they are listed below.

  • WASD - Movement
  • CTRL - Sprint / (When in air) Rotation
  • Left Click - "Web"
  • Right Click - Pull yourself towards web

Also the UI has a "compass" pointing up in the bottom left corner and a slider, to keep track of your head movement, on the right.

Please give feedback in the comments below!
